dublin_core.dcvalue: The traditional otorhinoendoscope is widely used in the diagnosis of a variety of ear and nose diseases but only one doctor can use it at a time It is also very difficult to share observations from one doctor with another doctor With advances in electronic health technology the extended potential application of smartphones to support medical practice or mobile health has grown steadily
An innovative smartphone-based otorhinoendoscope and its application in mobile health and teleotolaryngology.
